title: (x) Boston magazine angular sans - Foundry gridnik {Yves, Dav}
content: does anyone know the name of this font? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20060218011544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70078.jpg)
author: jawslinden

comments.content:
Should be ' [Gridnik](http://web.archive.org/web/20060218011544/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_gridnik/gridnik.html)'..   
   
_( Edit.: Naa, tooooo slow.. There you go, Yves.. )_
